Summary: circle of lights going up and down then suddenly disappears.
divs: Sighting DetailsIt happened on may 9, 2007 at 11:13pm , we were riding down the road when me and my two kids(15,18) seen a circle of lights that went up then back down and then disappered. The next night may 10, 2007 between 9 & 9:30 ( I dont know the exact time) me and my nephew (20) was coming back from taking my aunt her medicine. We seen the same thing as the night before and then it diusappered also. What makes it strange I was talking on the cell phone with my sister at the time, before I told her about what we were seeing her son ran into the house(hes 19) telling her he seen some lights. that was at the same time we seen them. At the time we were only 3 miles from my sisters house. All this happened in Scranton, sc. I was hoping it would come up on the internet somewhere that someone else saw it to.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Lake City
This sighting has never been favorited.
